title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ditch your old SRE playbook: AI SRE for root cause in minutes (AIM260)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 抛弃旧的SRE手册：AI SRE在几分钟内找到根本原因 (AIM260)
abstract: When the pager goes off, engineers face a wall of noise: logs, metrics, traces, configs, code, and fractured tribal knowledge. Traditional observability adds data but rarely a path to resolution, leaving teams with heavy cognitive load and little context of the whole production system. In this session, see how AI SRE agents cut through the chaos by reasoning across every source, using tools like humans, testing hypotheses, surfacing evidence-backed root causes in minutes, and learning from every interaction. Learn what it takes to make multi-agent AI SRE production-ready, and how enterprises use Resolve AI to put machines on-call for humans. This presentation is brought to you by Resolve AI, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 当寻呼机响起时，工程师面临着信息噪音墙：日志、指标、链路追踪、配置、代码和零散的部落知识。传统可观测性增加了数据但很少提供解决路径，给团队带来沉重的认知负担，对整个生产系统缺乏全面了解。在本次会议中，了解AI SRE代理如何通过跨所有数据源进行推理来突破混乱局面，像人类一样使用工具，测试假设，在几分钟内找出有证据支持的根本原因，并从每次交互中学习。了解使多代理AI SRE投入生产所需的条件，以及企业如何使用Resolve AI让机器为人类值班。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Resolve AI提供。
